instruction: If you could help me write an email to my friends inviting them to dinner on Friday, it would be greatly appreciated.
output:
Subject: Join us for dinner on Friday!

Dear friends,

We hope this email finds you well. We would like to invite you to join us for dinner on Friday at our place. We are planning a simple yet delicious meal and would love for you to be a part of it.

The details are as follows:

Date: Friday
Time: 7:00 PM
Location: Our place (Please let us know if you need the address)

We are looking forward to seeing you all and catching up. Please RSVP by Thursday so we can make the necessary arrangements.

Best,
[Your names]
